name: Biyankaa!
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: Happy Valentine's Day, Siti Fabiyanka Ramadhina, who has always been the reason for my beautiful days. In your every smile and gaze, I find irreplaceable happiness. No need for expensive flowers or fancy chocolates, because all I want is you by my side, today and forever. You are a special person who completes my life, and I am grateful for every moment we spend together. Thank you for making my life full of color and love. I love you, today, tomorrow, and forever.
